The more I play DBD, the more I notice how it's unbalanced. Windows shouldn't be allowed to be trapped, especially when there's a killer moving 15% faster than you and it's the only window left. UNBALANCED. It's funny how the devs call it 'asymmetrical' when it's just random spawning of items XD. If some important loops don't have pallets, survivors are pretty much fked! 15% speed boost and to top it off, no fall delay XD.

Edit: After playing as a killer, I now have massive respect for their tolerance.
Edit 2: After the update on 19th of July, 2022, the game has become trash .

No tengo muchas horas jugadas y estoy esperando a que unos amigos se lo compren para jugar juntos y darle mucha más caña pero las hora que llevo las he jugado solo, no tengo problema con la comunidad alguno se desconecta para no dar puntos cuando soy asesino y alguno campea cuando soy superviviente, eso no me molesta lo que me molesta es la espera para encontrar salas y creo que se puede deber a que no tengo los DLC con los mapas nuevos  pero me parece muy feo cobrarme casi 30 que salen los DLC de mapas (con personajes) después de comprar el juego, en mi opinion deberian de minimo bajar los precios de los DLC para que no sean tan sacacuartos, porque el juego me parece muy bueno solo y ya con gente tiene que mejorar una barbaridad, y es una pena que se eche ha perder por las largas esperas para encontrar salas.

Since Steam was wondering if I want to update my review: I do not recommend this game. Do not let my hours confuse you, I play because this is one of few games I can play with my partner and also because of Michael's new skin.

My tl;dr is the game is continuously buggy and broken and the devs intentionally used mobile-app-quality design because the goal is, without any sarcasm, to irritate the players and build an addiction on "outplaying" irritation. The game ENCOURAGES toxicity because... sometimes you're the one that's good, the one that gets to be toxic. 

Seriously, for years people have complained about the 20 minutes queue time, 5 minute load time, and then oops, you get hard tunneled and die with 3 minutes. If the Devs actually cared about the long-term health of the game, they would've made some kind of solution to the exact things that drive people away... but they don't. They crank out a new killer that's bugged, a new survivor with useless perks, a new charm, and call it a day. 

But honestly the Twins chapter is really what finally killed any love I had for the game. Why not have a killer where you just..... play as two killers. The only thing it is ever used for is camping. You can go troll gens AND be ready to insta-down your unhook, with a near-zero respawn/switch time.

This is one very unique game. I never thought I'd find myself playing something like this. It's not part of a normal "genre". It's 4 survivors versus a bloodthirsty killer (there are multiple types with each their own ability) and you have to survive and escape. You've got to power generators, whilst also hiding or running from a killer that is faster than you. There are perks to unlock, items to get through a unique system of spending "bloodpoints" in a "bloodweb". It's all really well done and keeps you wanting to play. But the main draw is the game is just fun, especially when you play with 3 other friends. You get an amazing feeling when you juke a killer or slam a pallet on their head, and you do genuinely feel your heart racing when you find yourself crouched in a corner and the killer steams passed you, and doesn't see you.

I'd recommend anyone to at-least try this game (you can always refund within 2 hours on steam). Even if you think it won't be your thing, it just might be!

UPDATE: The Game and it's developers appear to be okay with NFTs for this game and that in it's self is not something I wish to support. You may still read my old review where I almost praised this game but I cannot recommend buying this game anymore  in it's foolish support of NFTs. Steam said they were pulling games off shelves because of the dangers of NFTs and dare I say this game should go to #DownByDaylight



Dead By Daylight Brings the Horror Genre of Gaming to the Multiplayer Platform. Putting you in a 4 against 1 playstyle as you look around the Maps for Generators to start up and escape from the killers Grasp. I will say some of the enviorments look pretty scary for some people and look interesting for the most part.Each Survivor is exactly the same though so don't worry about picking a survivor over another.all the playstyles are blank pages for you to choose what they are good at.

PROS:
1.Spooky Atmosphere that will definately keep you on your toes even when the killers notifications are present (Heart Beat),You're constantly looking behind your back when you hear a heart beat cause you know.. the killer is out there and you may be the next unfortunate one to run into the killer before its too late.
2.All Killers have different Abilities,Whether you're the Shape,The Nightmare,The Trapper. Each killer has there own unique abilities so it gives them there own benefits and disadvantages. and that keeps players wondering whos the next killer they have to face against.
3.The Bloodline system is free to use and you don't have to spend money on getting blood points just play a game and you'll rack them up really easy and its good for reaching Prestige and unlocking perks to give your survivor.

The CONS.... Oh boy theres quite a few I wanna nail on.
1.NO VOICE CHAT at all... For a game in 2016  there should be voice chat for a game regardless if its a horror game and the devs wanna "Make the game more scary" if you're gonna do that then people are just gonna go to Skype,Discord etc. since they will fight your system.
2.Camping Killers - I dunno how many times I've had this happen where my team actually wants to help me or even I wanna help another player and Killers stay in the same spot until the survivor is officially dead. like Why? Why do that you completely kill the game that way.Along with the BodyBlocking is also a pain to deal with,I can never move thanks to survivors do ing that.
3.Some Survivor Perks are too OP for killers - I can get by Decisive Strikes,Borrowed Time and many other perks that you can gain but every player I heard uses them and some survivors make fun of the killer for even trying. I think its upsetting how players are using the emotes to make fun of the killer in a way but hey its my opinion.

But I will say cause I'm not complaining too much this game is still alot more fun then getting called for work on your day off.

My overall review I still think maybe this game should be 15$ instead of 20$ but that's just my opinion.

Nie zapomnijmy o wyjątkach czyli o spoconych kurewkach co rozwala ci caly team w 2min i na sam koniec napisza ci ez bo chlop ma przegrane przeciez 3k godzin
Lecz jak ty grasz zabojca to oczywiste bedzie to ze caly ich team bedzie mial walone w dupe latarki co cie beda nawalac po oczach co 3s oraz beda ciagle robic  rush geny
